name: Analogy from Manufacturing to Software Quality
description: Uses analogy to map quality practices across domains

theory.natural_language: In manufacturing, incoming inspection is like code review in software: both catch defects early. Final acceptance testing in manufacturing is analogous to end-to-end testing. Statistical process control aligns with automated quality gates. The software team asks how to replicate manufacturing controls.

queries.natural_language: What software practice corresponds to incoming inspection?

expected_answer.natural_language: Code review corresponds to incoming inspection by catching defects early.

queries.natural_language: Which activity mirrors final acceptance testing?

expected_answer.natural_language: End-to-end testing mirrors final acceptance testing.

queries.natural_language: What is the software analogue of statistical process control?

expected_answer.natural_language: Automated quality gates are the analogue of statistical process control.
